item.title: Stephen add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "When we meet real tragedy in life, we can react in two ways--either by losing hope and falling into self-destructive habits, or by using the challenge to find our inner strength." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day. You shall begin it serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Lou TIce
item.description: "Life is about choices, and you have the ability to choose. You always have had this ability. I suggest that not only do you have the ability, you have the responsibility to make choices for yourself. It is your life, and you are in the driver's seat, if you choose to be." -- Lou TIce

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Lou Tice
item.description: "All meaningfull and lasting change starts from the inside" -- Lou Tice
